title: Downtown Oklahoma City Stay with Six Dining Outlets, Rooftop Pool & Day Spa
description:
Discover all the excitement Oklahoma City has on offer with a stay at this downtown retreat. Boasting a prime location adjacent to the Oklahoma City Convention Center, you'll enjoy being within walking distance of the city's most popular attractions, including the Bricktown Entertainment District and the Oklahoma City National Memorial.

Savour mouthwatering dishes at the hotel's six unique dining outlets, including Bob's Steak & Chop House - specialising in Midwestern prime beef cooked to perfection - and Catbird Seat, where refreshing cocktails are matched with sweeping views of the OKC skyline. Take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool overlooking the city skyline, or for a touch of relaxation, visit Mokara Spa for a rejuvenating treatment.
offer_address: 100 West Oklahoma City Boulevard, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma 73109, United States
